name: SampleTank User Preset Instrument
summary: Preset instrument created by SampleTank, a sound sample creation program; contains user presets for different "Parent Sound" sound samples; based on a SampleTank Instrument unit, which consists of an .STH , .STI , and .STW file, and must remain in the same folder as these three files; opened through the application, not manually.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
